Posts.Content: May 27, 2013 10:16PM Moons4u wrote: Thank you, it was a really tough day today!!! For the 1st time in my life I hated a 3 day weekend. Now if I could only sleep!!!
Posts.Title: just a shout out to everyone waiting over this long weekend - debmc1958 anastaisa99

Posts.Content: May 26, 2013 09:00PM Moons4u wrote: Thank you! I am keeping myself busy with my 2 & 4 year old. My doctor told me this past week I have breast cancer, but waiting on final pathology. Hard news to get, but with young kids and work, I am keeping my mind distracted. Long road ahead of me, but I will get there.
Posts.Title: just a shout out to everyone waiting over this long weekend - debmc1958 anastaisa99

Posts.Content: May 26, 2013 10:40PM Moons4u wrote: My doctor is back in the office on Tuesday. I have an appointment with the plastic surgeon on Wednesday. I know it is invasive, just nothing more. She told me this past week and I spent the next day crying and then pulled myself together and went to work the next day. It is really hard!!! My husband has been amazing!! I am the first in my family and 38 years old. I put on a smile and continue to keep my mind busy. I have been on this website every night getting more and more information. Thank goodness for others posting information. It has been very helpful!!
Posts.Title: just a shout out to everyone waiting over this long weekend - debmc1958 anastaisa99
